alert.note: Alert for Eastern Pondera and Eastern Teton; Eastern Toole and Liberty; Western and Central Chouteau County (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 30 at 5:12PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Pondera, southern Toole and northwestern Chouteau Counties through 545 PM MDT... At 511 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles east of Brady, or 14 miles southeast of Conrad, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Pondera, southern Toole and northwestern Chouteau Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
